reviews.review:
Não recomendo o jogo pra ser usado como o jogo do desestresse porque voce vem pra se desestressar e acaba se estressando mais ainda, é um jogo muito bom pra ser jogado com mais 3 amigos porque jogar sozinho é uma escoria voce so cai com filho da puta que fica te farmando no guancho, quando não tem um assasino pau no cu que fica guardando caixão campando, fora isso é um jogo muito bom muito divertido que da pra perder umas boas horas jogando =D
Super recomendo dead by daylight jogo intenso com altas aventuras e muito divertido 
énoix.

Довольно интересная игра Dead by Daylight.Первый в своем роде. Начну пожалуй с плюсов игры:
1. Атмосфера, музыкальное составляющее, жуткие звуки, мрачные локации; все это держит игрока в напряжении.Даже отыграв в эту игру , я получаю порцию адреналина заходя поиграть в данный онлайн хоррор.
2. Персонажи. Я сейчас буду говорить исключительно о маньяках, так как они являются украшением игры. Все как на подбор, жуткие твари, проработанные до мельчайших подробностей, а это дыхание в меню при выборе персонажа(особенно у "медсестры"). Все они жуткие, и если они гонятся за вами, это вызывает непередаваемые эмоции.
3.Игра не привередлива в машине на которой вы ее запустите, даже интернет не так сильно влияет на ваш успех.
4. Геймплей за выживших. Да, здесь я пожалуй начну говорить более конкретно. Игра за выжившего, дарит вам непередаваемые эмоции, первые часы игры, вам даже страшно, вы просто начинаете прятаться, боясь всего окружающего. Но и наиграв много часов, игра награждает вас эмоциями уж поверьте.
5. Возможность играть с друзьями. Тут пожалуй описывать не чего.
Итак, настало время минусов:
1. Я о игроках. К примеру: в игре есть ранги, что бы более опытные и сильные игроки не играли с слабыми, так некоторые игроки, которые играют на высоких рангах, специально сбрасывают этот ранг, и начинаю "насиловать" игроков "новичков", а после игры пишут в чате оскорбления. Чаше такие индивидуумы встречаются на "выживших", издеваясь на "маньяками" низкого ранга. 
2. Игра за "маньяка".Чаще выступает в роли жертвы. Да "выжившие" не могут вас ударить или убить, но они на столько усилены перками. Плюс, фонари которыми они слепят вас... Игра за "маньяка" требует очень много терпения и стальных нервов.
3.Пожалуй на этом все, я не буду затрагивать тему.Я описал в общих чертах. Игра хороша и я в нее играю с удовольствием.

First of all i want to talk about the community which easily is the worst part about the game. A constant barrage of people basically shit talking each other. There is not a single game in which the end-game chat is not filled with insults or other dumb stuff. No matter how "hard" you win or lose a game you will rarley see a simple gg. Next I want to talk about huge discrepancies in killer balancing. There are 2 Killers in the game that, even if you are only half way decend at playing them, will crush almost any survivor. Since the game basically revolts around which killer you are up against and which side brings the stronger perk or add-ons there is a huge risk factor to not bring the meta perks. This creates a huge problem because people are scarred what the other side might bring along. Since the killers are scarred they will bring a mori which brings me to the next point. Moris. They have been a total game changer since the launch of the game and they were even stronger back then. They give you the ability to kill a survivor after the first hook which cuts chaces in half. Since I have been talking a lot about the game I want to mention the second worst thing about this game, the consistency. Nothing and I mean nothing in this game works out the same way just beacuse you do it the exact same. Hitboxes are by far the worst contender. A lot of killers sadly have to deal with these catastrophic hitboxes. A good example for this is the comparison between Huntress  and Deathslinger. If Huntress thorws a hatchet in the same dimension you are in there is a 100% chance that you will get hit by it. On the other hand if Deathslinger even dares to shot while he is even the slightest pixel of he will miss you entirely resulting in teabagging from the survivor. Blight sadly has to deal with this aswell because his ability revolts around bumping into things, sound easy. It isnt. A lot of surfaces look like you could bump into them but they are way to smooth so you just glide across them resulting in yet an other teabag from the survivors. Something that makes all of this even worst is the free movment suvivors have while running. I dont reacall being able to do full 360 degree cyricls while running without losing any momentum. This of course only applies to the survivors because killes who move faster have a significant turning speed penalty. I basically could go on forever because every match I play I discover some new bug. The last thing I want to mention are the developers. They take such a long time to patch bugs or rework something the community has been whining about for years, that it is just insulting. The last example I want to give to prove my point is the Iridescent Head add-on for the huntress. This add-on has been a problem since the realse of the killer in 2016 and they have still not changed even the slighest thing.

Lastly I want to say that this sadly is a one in a kind game, meaning no matter how bad it is there is no replacement for it.

Great game to play with friends. However DbD has a very toxic player base. With that being said each survivor and killer come with their own play style. The perks are well balanced (except hex:ruin that perk is op). The game isn't scary, but is adrenaline inducing. I find playing as a survivor that communication is key, as a killer setting a patrol route is key, but play the way you want and don't let the toxic community get to you.

萌新必须知道的一些基本操作：1.鼠标左键修理发电机、濒死恢复、尝试脱钩、救下钩上队友、治疗队友、破坏图腾、翻箱子。2.鼠标右键使用道具（医疗包，工具箱，钥匙，手电筒，地图）。3.ctrl键蹲下。4.空格键QTE、钩子挣扎、慢速进柜、慢速出柜、放板子、慢速过板、慢速翻窗、辅助动作（使用娃哈哈、针）5.shift开始奔跑，shift+空格快速进柜、快速出柜、快速翻窗、快速过板。6.E键能力激活（部分特殊技能如钢筋铁骨，声东击西才有）7.数字1键向前指，表示去那里。数字2键跟我来（你过来啊!）
前十个小时可能这还是个恐怖游戏，再多玩玩可能就不是啦。（但是个人感觉消声怨灵和敲钟还是有点吓人）
游戏里那些以“皇”命名的梗：
1.人皇：指喜欢主动寻找屠夫的强大存在，经常以一己之力溜屠夫数台发电机，皮断腿。（修机是不可能的）
2.机皇：执着于修理发电机，次次完美检验，150小能手，没有什么能阻挡我修机!（厄咒毁灭?不存在的）
3.怂皇：听到心跳就赶紧找个地方蹲起来，多用黑妹，自己都看不见自己。（屠夫：尼玛人都藏哪儿去了）
4.树皇：被屠夫追活不过十秒，常年在钩子上看风景，秒躺就是我了!（树下一分钟树上十年功）
5.柜皇：两个极端，第一种是常年躲在柜子里玩藏猫猫的另类怂皇，第二种是利用柜子把屠夫溜懵逼的人皇。
6.屠皇：经验老道的屠夫，砍的人类哭爹喊娘，但是有时非常热心的请人类吃苹果。
那么，问题来了，你想成为哪一种玩家呢?
I think we did a pretty good job so far (e.g. hit box)

Dont take the game too serious. Play DBD as a party game and the experince becomes so much better

Рекомендую эту игру! Играю каждый день и получаю удовольствие от игры! Надеюсь разработчики в скором времени исправят баги и сделают лучше подбор по рангам

Fun game if you play in a group or as the killer, not so fun if you play solo.  Usually it's an average of about 1/6 games being decent.  The rest are trash with hook camping children or perks that take all the fun away from playing.  The game should be more about the hunt/scare instead of ranking up.  Unfortunately the game is not scary at all and the hunt consists of perks that highlight everything so the thrill has gone as well.  Haven't even gotten to the micro transactions but that also seems to be a huge let down.  Shouldn't have to buy the game 5 times just for the new killers/survivors and then spend extra on cosmetics.

End game seems broken and rushed, if you're the last survivor you're basically hostage unless you can find the trapdoor before the killer does. Also don't believe killer should get priority of closing the hatch compared to the survivor jumping through it. After playing with end game for about a month, it's really killed the game for me.

Игру делали полтора землекопа, поэтому в ней до сих пор есть баги с момента релиза.
Зато разработчики оперативно без багов добавляют шмоточки за донат. И лично я считаю, что цена за шмоточки слишком завышена. Даже DLC для игры дешевле стоят (если сравнивать с легендарным (фиолетовым) шмотом).

Но концепция игры уникальная, интересная и действительно затягивает, поэтому у данной игры сформировалось стабильное [b]комьюнити[/b].
Но какое это [b]комьюнити[/b]?...
Основное [b]комьюнити[/b] - это токсичные подростки (12-16 лет).
В чем выражается токсичность? Можно переформулировать на: Как понять, что ты хороший игрок?
Если после игры в твоем профиле появились комменты по типу:
-rep camper and tunneler
-rep fcking russian trash player
и т.п, то я вас поздравляю! Вы - хороший игрок! 

Логика типичного сурва в данной игре:
Ты не имеешь права использовать какие либо тактики. Но при этом сурвы не видят ничего плохого сидеть в дискорде и общаться между собой.

И здесь я хочу немного сказать про [b]баланс[/b]:
-Видишь баланс?
-Нет
-И я не вижу, а он есть

Что я хочу сказать: если все 4 сурва играют в соло, а ман взял какого нибудь Билли, Нюрсу или Духа (в общем Тир 1 мана), то скорей всего у сурвов не будет шанса на побег.
А если сурвы с опытом + сидят в дискорде, то скорей всего у мана не будет шанса даже сделать минус 1.

Тоже самое по поводу [b]перков[/b].
Перков очень много. Можно делать различные комбинации.
Но проблема в том, что:
80% перков - бесполезны;
15% перков - ситуативны, можно юзать;
5% перков - маст хев, без которых играть очень тяжело.

И по хорошему разработчики должны делать так, чтобы все перки были минимум ситуативными. Не должно быть такого, чтобы часть перков (тем более большая их часть) являлись бесполезными и неиграбельными.
Но разработчики очень редко реворкуют перки.

I absolutely recommend this game.
Despite a community that ranges from wonderful to toxic incarnate, the game is a great experience for casual or in-depth play.

Für mich persönlich das beste Spiel, seit langem, das ich neu angefangen habe. Die Runden sind kurzweilig, aber nicht zu hektisch. Die Steuerung ist leicht verständlich - sowohl mit Maus und Tastatur, als auch mit Controller. Durch die verschiedenen Perks, Opfergaben und Gegenstände, Killer, Maps und Survivor ist keine Runde wie die andere. Man lernt schnell dazu und hat schon nach kurzer Zeit Erfolgserlebnisse - ob als Killer oder Survivor.

I think this game is alright compared to a specific patch a long time ago. Its more enjoyable to this day than it used to be. The MMR system recently put in is questionable but overall so far is worth while.

Jesus Christ this game has a toxic community.  I don't think I have ever played a game that had this level of elitist asshole activity in it.  Even in my days of halo and COD post lobby shit talking I have never experienced this level of absolute cunt.  I really don't get it that often from people who play as a killer but survivors are literally the worst people on earth.  I doesn't matter how you play as a killer.  You will always be accused of camping, tunneling, called every slur in the book, told to kill yourself.  This is of course unless they pull out body block exploits and escape, in which case the proceed to call you terrible at the game even though they wouldn't be able to survive without A. clipping of the killers and survivors and B. the speed boost they get after getting hit.  What they will do is open a door, then pull someone off a hook and intentionally stand in the way.  This body blocks you from getting to the injured person who just got pulled off the hook.  If you hit the fully healed person who is body blocking you then they get a huge speed boost and you get the normal stun after the hit.  The person who got off the hook leaves scott free, the body blocker leaves scott free and you are left with very little points and a lobby full of exploiters who regard themselves as god's gift to gaming and proceed to tell you to "kill yourself camper/tunneler."  They even use the same tactic to try and block you from getting to a hook.  Not even even in World Of Warcraft did players have this level of elitist, exploitative attitude.  In every game I have played thus far people regard themselves as skilled players based on their level of skill.  This game's players gauge their level of skill based on how well they can exploit game mechanics to their favor.  I would love to see how good they are if the developers would remove clipping between survivors and killers.  Then lets see how skilled these dip shits are.  Now I do have to say that not all players are like that.  There are plenty of players who are nice and good sports whether they win or lose.  Or there are players like me who know about the exploit but choose not to use it.  I go above and beyond to not be a dick to any opposing player, whether I am the killer or survivor.  I will even carry the last survivor to the escape hatch and let them get extra points.  I wish I could give this game a neutral rating because it is definitely fun when you don't get pieces of shit in your lobby or if you are playing with friends.  If you are just playing with friends then I do recommend it but because of the absolute POS level of players out there and the lack of effort put forth to deal with them I will be giving a thumbs down.

(I've been watching youtube content from dead by daylight for about 2 years now I don't have many hours cause I don't really enjoy playing the game)
First of all the community has no idea what actions are toxic and what actions aren't to the point where actively trying to survive and not get hit by killers is deemed "toxic" and is worth a facecamp. To be fair everything the killers do short of letting the survivors live is considered toxic as well. The developers have no idea how to balance a game and its very apparent. When they release a something broken it feels like their solution is instead of fixing the problem, release something equally as broken for the other side. This obviously leads to a fuck load of broken stuff for both sides and makes a lot of games unenjoyable. The devs also decide to fix a problem with another problem with bugs whereas instead of patching the bugs quickly, they ban people for shedding bugs to light. This may dissuade some people from using bugs but it doesn't fix the initial problem of the bug being in the game in the first place. The game itself has fundamental flaws that I'm pretty sure can never be fixed, for example if you're a survivor you have a large chance of having a shit game. Let me explain in DBD you will go down in a game it happens 95% of the time, now if the killer is a dick they can kill you right then and there by putting you on a hook and face camping. Unless one of your random teammates has borrowed time thats end game for you and your team is just gonna do gens. Now on the killer side 4 people running flashlights, instaheal medkits, and adrenaline is pretty much a loss unless you are using the most OP things imaginable. I'm rambling but there are so many problems with this game I could go on and on but, I'll stop here.

Zajebista gra, super spędzone 300 godzin. Gram prawie od jej początku, rozwija się ciągle i właśnie przechodzi drugą młodość. No jedyny minus to te kur wy jeb ane kampiące i szmaciarze pierdoleni którzy nie potrafią nikogo zabić bez tunelowania. Jeb ać te kur wy na pierwszych rangach, polecam grać dla zabawy, a nie rangi i wtedy gra będzie bardzo przyjemna. Pozdrawiam.

This game is amazing, the dev team pays attention to detail and is very in tune with the players. This is a horror game, and I normally can't play these types of games, but this one once you get used to it, it's all fun in games. 100% recommend this game and love the dev team.
стагнационная помойка

I got the game on a sale and purchased the DLC in hopes to play with friends. I have enjoyed playing the bit that I have and will probably continue to play some. The problems I have with the game are from the party system and the lack of a causal mode that I can play with friends and one of us can be the killer. The current mode that lets you play with friends just unlocks everything which is great for fun but kinda takes away from the experience of playing the game when you can level up your character.  Similar to Moba's a causal and ranked mode would not go a miss or at least have more options for the under the match settings. The biggest issue myself and friends had when playing as survivors together (which resulted in most of them not getting the game) was the party system dropping the group after ever game and having to reform to play again. The fact that you can't make the party in game and have to use steam to invite and join makes it all the worse. I personally enjoy the game but it would have been nice and a much better game if I could have played with friends. 3/5
Despite having it's many issues, It's pretty ok.

Although most of this damn game is just paying a lot for DLC, it is still a fun experience. The thrill of hiding, running and escaping the killer is invigorating. And as the killer, you know you have to please the entity before its too late, and have fun while doing so. The perk system is cool and the number of items and "offerings" to the entity is good as well. I just wish they gave away free updates, rather than paying for every killer they put in the game other than the base killers. (The only killer I have ever bought so far was the pig).
